Package com.example.drawingproject.cutils

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.drawingproject.cutils.Vector
  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a vector in 2D space.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Vector​(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Constructs a vector with specified end coordinates.
